info.name: Discord - Minimize/hide Channel + Friends sidebar
info.description:
Updated to work again.

This style shrinks the left sidebar (channels and friends) to 12px wide until you hover your cursor over it, which is when it expands to its full width.

A 12px width will allow you to see the white indicator that shows that someone has sent a message in a channel, without taking up too much space.

This style should work for all future versions of Discord, and will also continue being maintained as I depend on it daily myself.

This style AVOIDS minimizing the sidebar in the settings.


---

Also see my other styles for hiding "Gift nitro", "Send stickers", "Send GIF" and "Send emojis" buttons on the right hand side of the chatting input!
